==About TuxType [1.8.1]==
TuxTyping is an educational typing tutor for kids starring Tux, the Linux penguin. This educational game comes with two different games for practicing your typing, and having a great time doing it. Tux the penguin is hungry, and loves to eat you you type the right letters in time!
{{images/TuxType.jpg}}
==Features==
Learning to type
